--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider met both icy glares, and smiled sickly every time. "Energy
> storage skins? Boy sounds important." he mentioned in a laughing 
tone,
> grabbing the last of the good metal, and putting it in Astrotrain.


::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Domnijoe rolled her optics at Wildrider's attitude. 
    "Yeah, yeah." she griped. "At least the skins are useful." 
 She randomly tossed pieces of the wreckage over her shoulder. Once 
she finds the silver coloured pouches, she tosses them in to 
Astrotrain with the rest of the metal. She turns to Blindchaos. She 
still had unattended business to attend to.
    "You're walking."
    His smile fades a bit. 
    "C'mon...I didn't insult you."
    Domnijoe snarls. Her metallic teeth gleam in the sunlight.
    "THIS time you didn't"
    The male Decepticon's grin became teasing..almost flirtatious.
    "Plllleeeeaaaaassseeee?" he pleades. "With lots of sweet energon 
on top?" He batted his eyes. That always made her madder than hell.
    "ALRIGHT!!" 
    Domnijoe angerly transformed. Anything to shut the animalistic 
triple changer up. "Get in." she snapped.
    Giggling and thrilled to have won another argument with the 
Decepticon femmebot, he crawled in to her cockpit.
    Domnijoe smouldered internally but kept her temper when she spoke 
to Wildrider and Astrotrain. 
    "Where next?" she asked.
    

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

*************************
